title: Provide installer in portableapps.com format
author: sebthom
body_snippet:
Despite the fact that the official portableapps.com repo currently does not accept .NET applications it would be very handy to have a bundle in the PAF format that can be installed by individuals into their own portable apps launcher.

Packaging details at http://portableapps.com/development

I already created such a package for my own usage.

I am attaching a template for reference: [mRemoteNGPortableTemplate.zip](https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/files/654780/mRemoteNGPortableTempla...
